Description: Detects suspicious process injection attempts where an executable injects code into another process, indicating potential malicious activity.
Name: 7039f53f-0e96-476e-bdbd-d8d97c619386
Query:
let CreateRemoteThreadInjections = DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType == "CreateRemoteThreadApiCall"
    | extend Method = "CreateRemoteThread";
let MapViewInjections = DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType in ("MapViewOfFileApiCall", "NtMapViewOfSectionApiCall")
    | extend Method = "MapViewOfFile/NtMapViewOfSection";
let DirectDLLLoadInjections = DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType in ("LdrLoadDllApiCall", "LoadLibraryWApiCall", "LoadLibraryExApiCall", "CreateRemoteThreadApiCall")
    | extend Method = ActionType;
let Regsvr32Rundll32Injections = DeviceProcessEvents
    | where FileName in ("regsvr32.exe", "rundll32.exe")
    | extend Method = "Regsvr32/Rundll32 Execution",
             InjectedPayload = extract(@"(?i)(\S+\.dll)", 1, ProcessCommandLine);
let AllInjectionIndicators = union
    CreateRemoteThreadInjections,
    MapViewInjections,
    DirectDLLLoadInjections,
    Regsvr32Rundll32Injections;
let InjectorID = AlertEvidence
    | where AttackTechniques contains "T1055.002"
    | extend InjectorProcessId = tolong(parse_json(AdditionalFields).ProcessId)
    | where isnotnull(InjectorProcessId)
    | project InjectorProcessId;
let FilteredInjections = AllInjectionIndicators
    | extend InitiatingProcess = coalesce(InitiatingProcessFileName, FileName),
             TargetProcess = coalesce(FileName, InjectedPayload),
             TargetProcessId = coalesce(ProcessId, 0)
    | where InitiatingProcess != TargetProcess;
FilteredInjections
| join kind=inner (InjectorID) on $left.InitiatingProcessId == $right.InjectorProcessId
| distinct InitiatingProcessId, Method,
         TimeGenerated,
         DeviceId,
         DeviceName,
         InitiatingProcess,
         InitiatingProcessCommandLine,
         TargetProcess,
         TargetProcessId,
         ProcessCommandLine,
         InjectedPayload
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    DeviceId,
    DeviceName,
    Method,
    InitiatingProcess,
    InitiatingProcessId,
    InitiatingProcessCommandLine,
    TargetProcess,
    TargetProcessId,
    ProcessCommandLine,
    InjectedPayload = iff(isnotempty(InjectedPayload), InjectedPayload, "")
